alert.note: Alert for Bay; Holmes; Jackson; Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 3:00PM EDT until April 05 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northwestern Bay County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southern Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southeastern Holmes County in the Panhandle of Florida... Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 300 PM CDT. * At 159 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Graceville to 7 miles south of Eglin Air Force Base, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Panama City Beach, Vernon, Chipley, Graceville, Santa Rosa Beach, Bonifay, Marianna, Eglin Air Force Base, Bradford, Live Oak, Malone, Freeport, Cottondale, Greenwood, Ponce De Leon, Alford, Caryville, Wausau, Westville and Ebro. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM CDT for the Panhandle of Florida. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 600 PM CDT for southwestern Georgia. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 600 PM CDT for the Panhandle of Florida. Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM CDT for the Panhandle of Florida. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 600 PM CDT for southwestern Georgia. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 600 PM CDT for the Panhandle of Florida.
